description: This app, "Data Steps: How Do You Do This In SAS?", for HP TouchPad is one of a series of eBooks about SAS software programming focusing on frequently asked questions and answers, illustrated by code samples which can be sent by email directly from the app.  It is designed to encourage users to contribute questions some of which will be included in future versions of the app.  There are controls to select specific questions, move to the previous or next question, decrease or increase the font to suit the user's preference, and send emails requesting answers to questions not yet included in that version of the eBook.
versionNote: 3.0.0: (1) Standardised text formatting, (2) Added new question.  2.1.0: Added new book to Author section.  2.0.0: (1) Added index, (2) Corrected text. 1.5.0: Added 3 new questions. 1.3.0: Added app indicator in the Ask email. 1.2.0: (1) Split Introduction into 2 sections, (2) Updated text on controls. 1.1.0: Added details about the author and links to related web pages.
